pr_title: Otp2 separate out config loading in updaters

timeline.bodyText: Tip! There is no need to extend - unless you add/override parameters. The good thing of not extending is that is is clear that the super-config is enough.
timeline.author: t2gran

replies.bodyText: Also, this break the established naming convention - using Parameters for the role defined by the config consumer, and using Config for the role implementing the Parameters delivering the config to the consumer/domain.
